purpose.description: Your code is aimed at building an Animal Fun Facts interface where clicking an animal displays a random fact and optionally shows a background image. It imports animals, renders JSX, and wires click handlers to show facts, which aligns with the project goals.

readability.description: The code is fairly readable with logical variable names and inlined comments referencing tasks. It could benefit from cleaner separation of concerns and consistent formatting.

performance.description: Nice use of React root rendering and JSX composition. It demonstrates an end-to-end flow from data to UI.
